title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 83 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 83 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.
lineList.cn: （亚萨的诗歌）神阿，求你不要静默。神阿，求你不要闭口，也不要不作声。

lineList.en: For, lo, thine enemies make a tumult: and they that hate thee have lifted up the head.
lineList.cn: 因为你的仇敌喧囔。恨你的抬起头来。

lineList.en: They have taken crafty counsel against thy people, and consulted against thy hidden ones.
lineList.cn: 他们同谋奸诈，要害你的百姓，彼此商议，要害你所隐藏的人。

lineList.en: They have said, Come, and let us cut them off from being a nation; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance.
lineList.cn: 他们说，来吧，我们将他们剪灭，使他们不再成国。使以色列的名，不再被人记念。

lineList.en: For they have consulted together with one consent: they are confederate against thee:
lineList.cn: 他们同心商议，彼此结盟，要抵挡你。

lineList.en: The tabernacles of Edom, and the Ishmaelites; of Moab, and the Hagarenes;
lineList.cn: 就是住帐棚的以东人，和以实玛利人。摩押和夏甲人。

lineList.en: Gebal, and Ammon, and Amalek; the Philistines with the inhabitants of Tyre;
lineList.cn: 迦巴勒，亚扪，和亚玛力，非利士，并推罗的居民。

lineList.en: Assur also is joined with them: they have holpen the children of Lot. Selah.
lineList.cn: 亚述也与他们连合。他们作罗得子孙的帮手。（细拉）

lineList.en: Do unto them as unto the Midianites; as to Sisera, as to Jabin, at the brook of Kison:
lineList.cn: 求你待他们如待米甸，如在基顺河待西西拉和耶宾一样。

lineList.en: Which perished at Endor: they became as dung for the earth.
lineList.cn: 他们在隐多珥灭亡，成了地上的粪土。

lineList.en: Make their nobles like Oreb, and like Zeeb: yea, all their princes as Zebah, and as Zalmunna:
lineList.cn: 求你叫他们的首领，像俄立和西伊伯，叫他们的王子，都像西巴和撒慕拿。

lineList.en: Who said, Let us take to ourselves the houses of God in possession.
lineList.cn: 他们说，我们要得神的住处，作为自己的产业。

lineList.en: O my God, make them like a wheel; as the stubble before the wind.
lineList.cn: 我的神阿，求你叫他们像旋风的尘土，像风前的碎秸。

lineList.en: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;
lineList.cn: 火怎样焚烧树林，火焰怎样烧着山岭。

lineList.en: So persecute them with thy tempest, and make them afraid with thy storm.
lineList.cn: 求你也照样用狂风追赶他们，用暴雨恐吓他们。

lineList.en: Fill their faces with shame; that they may seek thy name, O LORD.
lineList.cn: 愿你使他们满面羞耻，好叫他们寻求你耶和华的名。

lineList.en: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever; yea, let them be put to shame, and perish:
lineList.cn: 愿他们永远羞愧惊惶。愿他们惭愧灭亡。

lineList.en: That men may know that thou, whose name alone is JEHOVAH, art the most high over all the earth.
lineList.cn: 使他们知道惟独你名为耶和华的，是全地以上的至高者。
